title: AstraZeneca vaccine discontinued in the UK, while concerns over Canadian and Mexico doses continue | Video

opengraph.description: The Astrazeneca Covid Vaccine has been a subject of controversy over the past couple of years… it was never approved here in the US, but was offered around the world, as a cheaper, easier to access alternative to Pfizer and Moderna. However, scandal followed in its wake. Back in 2021, a story by Reuters broke into the mainstream exposing that the millions of doses of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine that were shipped to Canada and Mexico and offered to the public… was done so WITHOUT health officials properly inspecting the operations of the U.S. manufacturer.
